sentences.sContent: I'll not want to say in front of the reporters.
sentences.sContent_eng: I'll not want to say in front of the reporters.
sentences.sCn: 我不愿在记者面前谈论我的观点。

sentences.sContent: She spent hours in front of the mirror, combing through her long hair.
sentences.sContent_eng: She spent hours in front of the mirror, combing through her long hair.
sentences.sCn: 她在镜子前花费好几个钟头梳理她的长发。
